name: Galactic Vanderblast
description:
Are you ready to take on the ultimate galactic challenge? Galactic Vanderblast is the space shooter game you've been waiting for! Blast your way through asteroid fields and enemy space ships to survive. Earn power-ups to upgrade your ship and take on the toughest bosses! With fast-paced action and amazing graphics, Galactic Vanderblast will keep you at the edge of your seat. So what are you waiting for? Grab your controller and prepare for intergalactic mayhem!

This is currently alpha version 0.1 . Move with WASD or arrow keys, shoot with spacebar.   Lots more to come!
In future builds, there will be: 

  • Music and sound effects
  • Power ups
  • AI enemies who will attack the player
  • Boss battles
